subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN1824, how did it go?
description_text:
The item just made it through customs in China and boarded a flight to
united states , probably be a month before I get it , do you think you
could send me the Rgb heel plate for the inconvenience? I'll give you a
good review

On Wed, Jul 9, 2025, 5:39 PM SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:

> Hello grace, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel.
> Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes
> a few

conversations.body_text: Hi tommy greico,    Please don't worry, your package will be delivered for you in two days. Regarding the RGB Heel Plate for Pro X Ultra, we can't gift it to you, but we can give it to you at a special price of $70 with no shipping cost, thanks for your understanding.

Ok , I can do that. I have a debit  card to pay the transaction

On Thu, Jul 10, 2025, 6:32 AM service@simsonn.com

Can you set the transaction up for the Rgb heel plate please.  I still
haven't received any updates in days since it got forwarded to local
carrier in usa.
Hi tommy greico,    You can click on this link to pay and we'll ship it to you from our US warehouse.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference

thank you i just paid it , when will i see the rgb heel plate ?


On Thu, Jul 17, 2025 at 2:24 AM service@simsonn.com

i finally got my pedal haptics took about 25 days but i got them . once i
get everything set up and programmed how i like them ill do a review on my
Youtube channel and send you guys the Link .

Hi tommy greico,     Sorry, this link has been changed due to you not paying for a long time, so you still need to make up the difference. But we need to check if you need the whole base plate or just the circled area, we can only ship the whole base plate.

Hi tommy greico,    Ok, thanks for your support, we will send you the base plate at a cost price . With the $10 you've already paid, that leaves $54.78 to pay, and you can pay the difference by clicking this link.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference
Hi tommy greico,     This is your logistics tracking link. https://t.17track.net/en#nums=9234690381925300117735

Thank you . I'll keep a look out for it

On Thu, Jul 24, 2025, 7:10 AM service@simsonn.com

?

tommy reacted via Gmail
<https://www.google.com/gmail/about/?utm_source=gmail-in-product&utm_medium=et&utm_campaign=emojireactionemail#app>

On Thu, Jul 24, 2025, 7:10 AM service@simsonn.com
